div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Spokane}
In the District Court of the Fourth Judicial District of the Territory of Washington holding terms at Cheney for the counties of Spokane Lincoln and Douglas

The Territory of Washington vs. E. Romick}
E. Romick whose full christian name is to the Grand Jury unknown is accused by the Grand Jury of the counties of Spokane Lincoln ad Douglas in the Territory of Washington and the District aforesaid of the crime of Grand Larceny committed aforesaid.

The said E. Romick on the seventeenth day of February A D 1885 in the county of Lincoln in the District aforesaid, did then and there feloniously steal take and carry away five thousand cars of the value of three hundred and thirty dollars of the goods chattels and property of the Northern Pacific Railroad Company a corporation created under and by virture of the laws of the United States.
Dated at Cheney in the district aforesaid the 15th day of April A D 1885. S.C. Hyde Prosecuting attorney by M M Murray Deputy
Names of the witnesses summoned before the grand jury C.F. Bassett John Cody W.F. Woodard E. Pendleton W.H. Rich
Presented to the court by the foreman of the Grand Jury in their presence, and filed this the 16th day of April A.D. 1885. Kate W. Feauerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
The Territory of Washington vs. E. Romick
Found on the instance of F.P. Wayworth
A true bill David Strong Foreman of the Grand Jury
